question: The documentary of which Indian Football league has won the ‘BAFTA Scotland’ Awards 2019 in the 'Single Documentary' category?
explanation: The documentary on Real Kashmir Football Club has bagged the prestigious British Academy of Film and Television Awards (BAFTA) and Scotland Awards 2019 at a glittering ceremony in Glasgow, Scotland. The documentary narrates the journey of former Rangers ace David Robertson as the coach of Real Kashmir FC, which is currently India\'s second tier football league. The hour-long film won in the \'Single Documentary\' category.
